remarks: Value of an operation given by a maps-to rule, where the first argument is a pair and the base set of the second argument is the first component of the first argument.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Oct-2017.)
statement:
mpt2xopoveq.f $e |- F = ( x e. _V , y e. ( 1st ` x ) |-> { n e. ( 1st ` x ) | ph } ) $.
mpt2xopoveq $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ W e. Y ) /\ K e. V ) -> ( <. V , W >. F K ) = { n e. V | [. <. V , W >. / x ]. [. K / y ]. ph } ) $.
$d K n x y $.
$d V n x y $.
$d W n x y $.
$d X n x y $.
$d Y n x y $.
